_header: Sweet Jesu Christ to Thee / Culpable wretch I yield me
Subjects: prayers, of confession; confession, forms of
_description: A prayer of Confession — in couplets

BodDou302.First Lines:
Swete ihesu crist to þeCoubabil wreche y ȝild
                    me…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…Loke ȝe say þis oresounDewoutle with
                    deuocion
BodDou302.Editions:
Whiting,  Ella Keats,
                        ed.  
             John Audelay: The Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 184 (1931); repr. 1988: 80-1.

CULIi643.First Lines:
SWete ihesu crist to þeCulpable wrecche y ȝelde
                    me…
CULIi643.Last Lines:
…In to þat blyssffull empyreThere þat þu
                    reygnest lorde & syre

Fellowes.First Lines:
Swete ihesu crist to þeCopable wrecche ich ȝelde
                    me…
Fellowes.Last Lines:
…Yn to þat blisse of [heuene lyght]Þer þou
                    reynest lo[rd of myght]
Fellowes.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James. 
             “A Confession of Sins and a Prayer for Mercy.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         9 (1897): 129-30. 
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             The Minor Poems of the Vernon Manuscript, Part 2.
EETS
         o.s. 117 (1901; repr. 1973): 2.785-6.
